Translations.Text: They said Nonsense dreams When it pojdem interpretation z dreams my je knowledgeable
(Jeden saved zalar) said teraz he finally zapamatat si ja tell ona its interpretation so send mna Joseph
Joseph moj znamy informovat us 7 fat cows zrat 7 skinny cows 7 zeleny spikes others shriveled Ja zelat si do ist some informacia ludia
He said Co ona cultivate dalsi 7 rocnik when cas zatva pojdem lavy zrno ich spikes except for co ona jestn
After ze, 7 rocnik drought pojdem kto will consume vela z co ona stored them
After ze, rocnik pojdem brings relief ludia they znova potlacit ovocny juice
king said Bring him mna. When posol pojdem him he said Ist tvoj lord ziadat him investigate zensky rez ich hands Moj Lord bol fully aware z ich kut plany

(king) said (do zensky) Co robit ona zauzlit incident when ona tried zvadzat Joseph? They said GOD zakazat; my nie zauzlit z anything zly committed by him. manzelka governor said Teraz truth prevailed Ja je jeden tried zvadzat him he bol truthful
Ja hope he realize ze ja never zradit him jeho absence GOD nie zehnat kut plany betrayers
